description: Light blue ice with crystalline patterns and crystal-like reflections

base_colors.note: Light blue ice colors with blue value fixed at 255

color_override.note: Complete white override for crystal reflections

generation_algorithm.step1: Calculate local pixel coordinates: pixelX_ice = globalX % 16, pixelY_ice = globalY % 16
generation_algorithm.step2: Generate triple noise: iceNoise = (sin(pixelX_ice * 0.8 + pixelY_ice * 0.6) * 0.3 + cos(pixelX_ice * 0.4 + pixelY_ice * 0.9) * 0.3 + sin((pixelX_ice + pixelY_ice) * 0.7) * 0.4) * 0.5 + 0.5
generation_algorithm.step3: Apply base colors: r = 200 + iceNoise * 30, g = 230 + iceNoise * 20, b = 255
generation_algorithm.step4: Apply crystal reflections at pattern coordinates (override with white)
generation_algorithm.step6: Clamp all color values to [0, 255] range

metadata.purpose: JSON conversion of hardcoded ice texture algorithm
metadata.pattern_type: Pattern 4 - Triple noise generation with special crystal reflections

conversion_notes.algorithm_complexity: Advanced triple noise generation with crystal reflection overlay
conversion_notes.validation_required: Generated texture must match semi-transparent ice blocks in-game
